name: PepeLine
description:
PepeLine is a simple and very addictive 3D sliding puzzle game. Challenge your brain and swap the tiles with your fingers to recreate the path in order to solve each puzzle.

Pepe & Line have been lost in a magical world. Help them find their way to get together and explore the variety of amazing natures in this unique game!

FEATURES:

* EASY GAMEPLAY
- For both children and adults

* PILE OF EPIC LEVELS
- Hours and days of fun

* UNIQUE BOARDS
- 4x4, 5x5, ZigZag, 3 in 1 and much more

* MORE VARIATIONS
- Challenge mode, star mode and against clock

* 7 DIFFERENT FAIRYWORLDS
- Garden, Jungle, Mountains, Lava, Desert, Forest, Boat

* EXTRA TILES FOR MAJOR CHALLENGE
- Rotable, Magic, 1 Step, etc.

* IN-GAME FUNCTIONS:
- RESTART: Restart a level quickly.
- UNDO : Have a mistake? Just put it back.
- HINTS : Can’t solve a level? Ask your faithful friend.

* LEADERBOARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS
- Beat your friends high score
